channel.title: Need Help! Lowering save feature!
channel.description:
I need to decrease the ammount of times the save feature goes off, or even make it so when you log out, it saves..
Can anybody help me with this?

item.title: Need Help! Lowering save feature!
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Well if you are still reading this Nics, you can use a timer for it. If you search for smitimer in client.java (assuming you are using a CheezScape base), you should see public int smitimer = 300;. There is more code here, but that is not needed yet. Currently, that number goes down by 2 every second. So, every 2.5 minutes it will save. To change this, say to every 5 or 10 minutes, set it to 600 or 1200, respectfully.
I Hope this helps,
“Cooper”

Read full topic

@BobDole81 wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:5, topic:36221”]Jp-Skate, if you are only going to complain, flame, and be rude to others, you are not welcome here. This is a place for people who can actually talk respectfully. The reason so many people are leaving is because people like you only flame, spam, and “act stupid.” So please, think before you act. Also, if this is about RuneScape 2, please post this in RuneScape 2 Server Development/Help.
Thanks,
“Cooper”[/quote]
Thank you for politely helping out here cooper - it’s appreciated. As I’m sure this does actually refer to Rs2, I will move it.
